 3. We must choose a suitable time series forecasting method. Given the relatively short history and the data showing some daily seasonality (patterns repeating every 24 hours),

 4. We can use a simple seasonal model like Seasonal Naive, where we forecast each hour by the value of the same hour in the previous day.
